Response.Say: Poop. there's poop everywhere. i don't know where all the poop came from. it does not look like my poop and it smells like my ex boyfriend's poop i think he might have broken in and pooped on everything please come clean it up and change the locks right away. he must have been saving his poop for days there is poop literally everywhere there is so much poop and its all really soft please please come quickly
